text.section: The council shall advise the Cabinet for Health and Family Services about health and medical care services.
The council shall have the opportunity for participation in policy development and program administration and shall advise the Cabinet for Health and Family Services on such matters.
The council shall give advice regarding how to further the participation of recipient members in the policy development and program administration of the Medical Assistance Program.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 231, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 197, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1979 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 9, effective February 10, 1979. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, secs. 49 and 107(12). -- Amended 1960 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 2. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. VII, sec. 6.
